mapper.select: select distinct p.* from event_relation_object r1 join event_relation_object r2 on r1.EVENT_ID = r2.EVENT_ID join unit_info p on r2.OBJECT_ID = p.unit_id where r1.OBJECT_TYPE = 'unit' and r2.OBJECT_TYPE = 'unit' and r1.IS_DELETE != '1' and r2.IS_DELETE != '1' and p.is_delete != '1' and r1.OBJECT_ID = #{unitId};
